about_me: Over a decade of professional experience in web technologies. Dedicated to solving complex problems through code, passionate about software development, and eager to learn and create new solutions. Actively contributes to open-source communities and is ready to connect and build innovative projects. I aspire to establish a prominent presence as a software developer within an integrated business solution provider, actively contributing to the substantial growth of the company. Concurrently, I seek to ensure my personal advancement within the organization. I am confident that my robust technical acumen, comprehensive functional skills, and adept communication abilities will equip me to successfully tackle the challenging career trajectory that lies ahead

core_skills.name: App Planning & Design
core_skills.description: Expert in conceptualizing, planning, and designing applications from the ground up. This involves translating client requirements into functional blueprints, ensuring user-friendly experiences, and considering both frontend and backend needs to ensure smooth development processes and scalability.

core_skills.name: Database Design
core_skills.description: Specialized in designing efficient, scalable, and optimized databases to ensure robust performance. I ensure data integrity, consistency, and security by carefully planning schema, relationships, indexing, and normalization strategies to meet both present and future needs.

core_skills.name: UI & UX Design
core_skills.description: Skilled in designing intuitive, aesthetically pleasing user interfaces (UI) that are both functional and engaging. I focus on improving the overall user experience (UX) by considering usability, accessibility, and emotional connection, ensuring that applications are easy to use and visually appealing.

core_skills.name: App Development
core_skills.description: Proficient in developing dynamic, scalable applications using various programming languages and frameworks. I focus on delivering reliable, high-performance web and desktop applications with a strong emphasis on both functionality and user satisfaction.

services.name: Web App & Website Development
services.description: Designs and develops responsive, user-friendly web applications and websites tailored to business needs. Ensures cross-browser compatibility, security, and scalability.

services.name: Desktop App Development
services.description: Creates powerful and efficient desktop applications using Java and other technologies. Focuses on delivering feature-rich and user-friendly experiences.

services.name: WordPress Plugin & Theme Development
services.description: Specializes in creating custom WordPress plugins and themes to extend website functionality and improve aesthetics, aligned with client requirements.

services.name: E-commerce Solutions
services.description: Builds robust e-commerce platforms with secure payment integrations, product management systems, and a seamless shopping experience for customers.

services.name: Server Administration & Management
services.description: Provides reliable server setup, administration, and maintenance to ensure optimal performance and uptime. Skilled in managing Linux-based servers and cloud services.

services.name: Technology Consultation & Training
services.description: Offers expert advice on technology solutions and conducts training sessions to help teams stay updated with the latest tech trends and best practices.

services.name: Web Scraping
services.description: Develops automated scripts to scrape and process data from websites, ensuring accuracy and compliance with ethical and legal guidelines.

projects.name: HostSaler Laravel Backend
projects.description: HostSaler is a powerful backend solution for hosting service management, designed to help businesses and organizations manage web hosting operations efficiently. Built with the Laravel framework, it offers seamless integration with various web hosting functionalities, making it easier for users to handle and track hosting plans, customers, and payments

projects.name: Block Editor
projects.description: The Block Editor is a robust web development tool that simplifies the creation of dynamic and customizable HTML layouts. Developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it empowers web developers to efficiently construct content-rich pages

projects.name: Bulk Mailer Desktop App
projects.description: A Java-based bulk mailing application that integrates with the Gmail API, facilitating automated email sending. Supports multiple Google and SMTP accounts, offering flexibility for users managing diverse accounts concurrently.

projects.name: HelpDesk
projects.description: An email client employing Gmail API and SMTP server functionalities. Facilitates management of numerous Gmail accounts, users with diverse permissions, and actions like replying and forwarding. Features integrated chat capabilities and comprehensive admin-assigned filtering and restrictions.

projects.name: DexMail Web App
projects.description: A robust and feature-rich email marketing application developed from concept to completion within a three-month period. Empowers users with advanced email marketing capabilities.

projects.name: WP Backup
projects.description: A WordPress backup plugin written in PHP. Provides functionality to backup both the database and files, compress them, and upload them to a remote server using FTP or instant download. Also manages backup history.

projects.name: Private Plugin Manager
projects.description: A WordPress plugin that facilitates the management and updating of personally hosted plugins. Designed for WordPress administrators who maintain their private plugin repository on a dedicated server.

projects.name: Product Customizer
projects.description: Create unique garment designs effortlessly with our customization app. Add logos, graphics, and more to bring your ideas to life!

projects.name: WordPress Contact
projects.description: The Gmail API Contact WordPress Plugin allows you to manage contact forms and send messages via Gmail API directly from your WordPress website.

work_experience.responsibilities: Versatile web developer proficient in PHP, Java, Laravel, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Designed, developed, and maintained diverse web applications, collaborated with cross-functional teams, and troubleshooted technical issues for optimal performance.

Dynamic web developer skilled in PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Transformed ideas into functional applications, enhanced digital presence through strategic initiatives, and optimized user experiences.

song_play_instruction:
To play a song, use the following iframe structure and replace {track_id} with the specific track ID:
<iframe width="100%" height="300" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" allow="autoplay" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=https%3A//api.soundcloud.com/tracks/{track_id}&color=%23ff5500&auto_play=true&hide_related=false&show_comments=true&show_user=true&show_reposts=false&show_teaser=true&visual=true"></iframe>, Just iframe will be as respons no other text before and after.
